sen.j: 京都府は旧国制度で丹後国、丹波国（一部兵庫県を含む）、山城国の3つに分けられるがその中で京都府南部地域（きょうとふなんぶちいき）とは大まかに、次の5つの定義がなされる場合が多い。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture used to be divided by its old province system into 3 - Tango Province, Tanba Province (which includes a part of current Kobe Prefecture) and Yamashiro Province, and the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture is roughly defined as below.

Kyoto Prefecture can be divided into three provinces, that is, Tango, Tanba (including a part of present Hyogo Prefecture), and Yamashiro, by former province system, however, the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture has roughly five definitions as follows.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。ルールに従い原文・訳文を分割、編集しました。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture can be divided into three provinces, that is, Tango, Tanba (including a part of present Hyogo Prefecture), and Yamashiro, by former province system, however, the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture has roughly five definitions as follows.

sen.j: 山城国並びに丹波国の南部、大まかに船井郡、南丹市、亀岡市、京都市、向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡、宇治市、城陽市、久世郡、八幡市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、木津川市、相楽郡（天気予報での京都府南部。ヤマト運輸も以上を京都ターミナル管轄と扱う(北部は兵庫県の神戸ターミナル管轄)）。
sen.e: 1. Yamashiro Province and the southern part of Tanba Province which roughly includes Funai-gun, Nantan City, Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni-gun, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse-gun, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun, Kizugawa City, and Sora-gun (This is the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture designated for the purpose of weather forecasts)
sen.cmt: 原文中で５つの定義がされているのに、具体的に数字がふられていませんので、訳文中で補足しています。
sen.e: 1. Yamashiro Province and the southern part of Tanba Province, which roughly includes Funai County, Nantan City, Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County, Kizugawa City, and Sora County (this definition is used for weather forcast as the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture, and for Yamato Transport Co., Ltd. as the territory of Kyoto Terminal [the northern region is of Kobe Terminal in Hyogo Prefecture]).
sen.cmt: 原文が途中で分割されていたため、訳文と共に1文にしました。
sen.e: 1. Yamashiro Province and the southern part of Tanba Province, which roughly includes Funai County, Nantan City, Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County, Kizugawa City, and Sora County (this definition is used for weather forcast as the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture, and for Yamato Transport Co., Ltd. as the territory of Kyoto Terminal [the northern region is of Kobe Terminal in Hyogo Prefecture]).

sen.j: 1のうち淀川水系（水を流せば淀川を通じ大阪湾に流れる地域）の南丹市（旧美山町 (京都府)を除く）、亀岡市、京都市、向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡、宇治市、城陽市、久世郡、八幡市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、相楽郡。
sen.e: 2. Yodo River basin (the area whose water ends up in Osaka Bay through Yodo River) among the region in Definition 1, which are Nantan City (excluding former Miyama-cho, Kyoto Prefecture), Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni-gun, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse-gun, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun and Sora-gun.

2. Among the definition 1, area of the Yodo-gawa water system (which water could end up in Osaka Bay through the Yodo-gawa River) which includes Nantan City (excluding former Miyama Town, Kyoto Prefecture), Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.

2. Among the definition 1, area of the Yodo-gawa water system (which water could end up in Osaka Bay through the Yodo-gawa River) which includes Nantan City (excluding former Miyama Town, Kyoto Prefecture), Kameoka City, Kyoto City, Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.

sen.j: 山城国：2のうち京都市（旧京北町を除く）、向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡、宇治市、城陽市、久世郡、八幡市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、相楽郡
sen.e: 3．Yamashiro Province, which only includes Kyoto City (excluding former Keihoku-cho), Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni-gun, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse-gun, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun and Sora-gun among the region in Definition 2.

3．Yamashiro Province, which includes Kyoto City (excluding former Keihoku Town), Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County among the region in Definition 2.

3．Yamashiro Province, which includes Kyoto City (excluding former Keihoku Town), Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County among the region in Definition 2.

tit.j: 3のうち、京都市を除いた地域
tit.e: 4. The region which Kyoto City is excluded from the region in Definition 3.
4. The region which Kyoto City is excluded from the region in Definition 3.
4. The region which Kyoto City is excluded from the region in Definition 3.

sen.j: - 向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡、宇治市、城陽市、久世郡、八幡市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、相楽郡
sen.e: Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni-gun, Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse-gun, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun and Sora-gun.
Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.
Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, Otokuni County Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.

tit.j: 4のうち、向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡を除いた地域
tit.e: 5. The region which Muko City, Nagaokakyo City and Otokuni-gun are excluded from the region in Definition 4.
5. The region which Muko City, Nagaokakyo City and Otokuni County are excluded from the region in Definition 4.
5. The region which Muko City, Nagaokakyo City and Otokuni County are excluded from the region in Definition 4.

sen.j: - 宇治市、城陽市、久世郡、八幡市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、相楽郡
sen.e: Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse-gun, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun and Sora-gun.
Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.
Uji City, Joyo City, Kuse County, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki County and Sora County.

sen.j: 京都市が事実上京都府の政治経済の中心であり、中部と南部の中間点にあり、人口の55%をしめるので、4もしくは5をさす場合が多い。
sen.e: The above five definitions are often used, however, because Kyoto City which is located in the middle of the central and the southern part of the Prefecture occupies 55% of the population and is the actual political and economical center of the Prefecture, the definition of the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture often indicates 4 or 5.

Because Kyoto City, the virtual center of the politic and economic, is located in the middle of the central and the southern part of the Prefecture and occupies 55 percent of the population, the Definition 4 or 5 is often used.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。ルールに従い原文・訳文を分割、編集しました。
sen.e: Because Kyoto City, the virtual center of the politic and economic, is located in the middle of the central and the southern part of the Prefecture and occupies 55 percent of the population, the Definition 4 or 5 is often used.

sen.j: しかし、4は京都府の山城広域振興局の管内地域であり、その中の向日市、長岡京市、乙訓郡は地勢上も、経済上も京都市と一体にされることが多く、5の山城地区を狭義の京都府南部地域として扱われることが多い。
sen.e: However, because the region in Definition 4 is under the control of Yamashiro Wide-area Promotion Bureau of Kyoto Prefecture and Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, and Otokuni-gun among that region often regarded as a part of Kyoto city geographically and economically, therefore, the region in Definition 5 in Yamashito area is often regarded as southern region of Kyoto Prefecture in a limited sense.

However, because the region in Definition 4 is under the control of Yamashiro Wide-area Promotion Bureau of Kyoto Prefecture and Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, and Otokuni County among that region often regarded as a part of Kyoto City geographically and economically, therefore, the region in Definition 5 in Yamashiro area is often regarded as southern region of Kyoto Prefecture in a narrow sense.

However, because the region in Definition 4 is under the control of Yamashiro Wide-area Promotion Bureau of Kyoto Prefecture and Muko City, Nagaokakyo City, and Otokuni County among that region often regarded as a part of Kyoto City geographically and economically, therefore, the region in Definition 5 in Yamashiro area is often regarded as southern region of Kyoto Prefecture in a narrow sense.
